outputs.output_descr:
•	A capacity building and institutional strengthening framework based on the human development paradigm and comprising:
Training needs assessment (MMPW, Municipalities in 18 Governorates, including Baghdad Municipality)
Human resources development plan:
Policy development;
Institutional development;
Organizational development;
Local administration development (of Governorates):
Participation/representation development; and
Community development framework
•	Capacity building for the executives, senior and mid-level management including leadership skills development
•	Capacity building at the human resource and organizational levels and integration of Information management and information technology.
•	Central and Local IT Strategy for service automation

project_descr: Capacity Building and Institutional Strengthening of Ministry of Municipality and Public Works
project_title: Capacity Building and Institutional Strengthening of Min
